description: La Ciudad Posible is an organization focused on urban planning and sustainable development across Chile, Argentina, and Uruguay. Founded in 2008-2009, it began as a collaborative platform for professionals in urban ecology, sociology, and architecture. Over time, its mission evolved to promote inclusive, resilient, and regenerative cities, addressing critical issues like climate change and resource depletion. Ciudad Posible aims to facilitate transitions towards circular economies and sustainable practices in urban environments and beyond.
name: La Ciudad Posible
